pages.text: Days and nights are now longer, days are 30 minutes, nights are 20 minutes for a total of 50 minutes per full day! $(br2)Under the sky, you're safe from mobs as they won't spawn. Except phantoms. Make sure to sleep once in a while to keep them away.
You can always sleep to pass the night. Alternatively, the Ritual of Moonlight from Ars Nouveau can be used to skip the day.

Be aware of the Blood Moon! During a Blood Moon, hostile mobs will spawn even in the overworld in large numbers. $(br2)To make matters worse, you cannot sleep through a Blood Moon. Be prepared and stay vigilant!
